headline: “WATCH WHAT HAPPENS!” GOP debate nearly comes to BLOWS when Josh Mandel calls out Mike Gibbons
author: Fred T
sentences: Candidate Mike Gibbons was worked up because Mandel called him out over his ties to China, and in return accused Mandel of never having worked a real job.
The Freedomworks event came close to physical throwdown after the FIRST question, which was about China.

That’s when the magic happened, including the sentence, “watch what happens, p***y!”
J.D.
Things got SUPER heated at a GOP primary debate in Ohio this week.
Maybe all primary debates should have some kind of UFC match.
He didn’t take that too kindly and got in Gibbons face.
Vance later called the whole thing contrived.
I’m just sayin to think about it, y’all.
They could even use entrance music.
Sure livened up the debate for me.
Mandel served two tours in Iraq.
